features.feature: 亲爱的用户，本次更新主要针对系统进行了优化，推荐您进行更新。
• 新增资源库功能，根据应用功能自动分类、智能推荐已安装应用，通过易于浏览的视图，更轻松地打开所需应用，在桌面内任意位置上滑即可体验。
• 合入安卓2025年3月安全补丁，增强系统安全性。有关荣耀软件安全更新内容的信息，请访问荣耀官方网站 https://www.honor.com/cn/support/bulletin/2025/3
合入安卓2024年11月安全补丁，增强系统安全性。有关荣耀软件安全更新内容的信息，请访问荣耀官方网站 https://www.honor.com/cn/support/bulletin/2024/11
1. 本次更新不会删除您的用户数据，但仍建议您在更新前做好数据备份。 2. 更多精彩功能介绍，请访问“玩机技巧”应用。 3. 如果您在使用过程中遇到任何问题，请访问“我的荣耀”应用或访问荣耀官方服务网站 https://www.honor.com/cn/contact-us 寻求支持。
Dear user, this recommended update has optimized the system.

• Library automatically categorizes apps by their functions, and intelligently suggests installed apps. Additionally, it facilitates opening required apps through a user-friendly interface. You can experience it by swiping up anywhere on the Home screen.

• Android security patch (Mar 2025) has been incorporated for system security. For more information about HONOR Security updates, please visit our website https://www.honor.com/global/support/bulletin/2025/3

Android Security Patch (Nov 2024) has been incorporated for system security. For more information about HONOR Security updates, please visit our website https://www.honor.com/global/support/bulletin/2024/11

1. Installing this update will not erase your personal data, but a backup beforehand is still recommended. 2. Go to Tips to check out more information on product features. 3. If you encounter any problem during use, you can get our support by going to My HONOR or visiting our website at https://www.honor.com/cn/contact-us
